author: psmith
msg: Fixed issue where If the tab was undocked, the Events label and Filter
panel went back to the old layout style.

author: psmith
msg: Another 'interesting' change to minimise vertical height loss.
Merged the Events # panel and the Filtering panel into one.  The two
could use a decent vertical line separator, but i haven't had a chance
to do that yet, will use the same one that will be used for the Toolbar
separators as per standard Toolbar ui's.

author: psmith
msg: another very subtle UI change, give each row a little more height,
makes it easier on the eye.  There may be a smarter may of doing this
but I was too dumb to find it.  Would rather it be HeightOfFont+X, but
RowMargin property doesn't give me the same effect.
